title: Bug 120922 - "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: When editing the XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor and then attempting to switch back to the Layout view, the user receives an error message indicating that they need to save their changes. The error message appears as "Source page is dirty. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved.", and a dialog prompt asks the user if they want to save the changes (Yes), discard the changes (No), or cancel the action (Cancel). However, the options in the dialog are not very clear and it is not obvious how to save or discard the changes. The dialog itself is titled "Error".
OB: When trying to switch from the XML source view to the Layout view, an error message is displayed: "Source page is dirty. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved." The options (Yes, No, Cancel) in the dialog prompt are not clear on how to save or discard changes.
